# postman Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "postman" {
  api_key = "postman_api_key"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) API Key for the Postman API. May also be provided via POSTMAN_API_KEY environment variable.
